definition: China Insurance Regulatory Commission (CIRC), abbr. for 中國保險監督管理委員會|中国保险监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Bao3 xian3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The specific measures for rewarding shall be separately formulated by the CIRC .
sentences.chinese: 具體獎勵辦法由中國保監會另行制定。

sentences.english: Where a director encounters barriers when he normally exercises his power, he shall report it to the CIRC .
sentences.chinese: 董事正常行使職權遇到障礙，應當向中國保監會報告。

sentences.english: The production of the "Power of Attorney for Concurrent-Business Insurance Agency" shall be centrally supervised by the CIRC.
sentences.chinese: 《保險兼業代理委託書》由中國保監會統一監製。

sentences.english: The provisions on the establishment and administration of special-purpose institutions will be formulated by the CIRC separately.
sentences.chinese: 專屬機構的設立和管理，由中國保監會另行規定。

sentences.english: Xiang Junbo, the former boss of the Agricultural Bank of China (ABC), another government-run banking goliath, is the new insurance regulator.
sentences.chinese: 中國農業銀行前行長項俊波成爲新一任保監會主席。

sentences.english: He was named Saturday as the chairman of the China Insurance Regulatory Commission, replacing Wu Dingfu.
sentences.chinese: 他在週六接替了吳定富成爲中國保監會主席。

definition: China Banking Regulatory Commission (CBRC), abbr. for 中國銀行業監督管理委員會|中国银行业监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Yin2 hang2 ye4 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
to crack down on/to take severe measures against

pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Wai4 hui4 Guan3 li3 ju2
